channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 16:40 Alarm lifted in Poltava region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 16:40 Alarm lifted in Poltava region. Follow further messages. #Poltava_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 16:36 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 游리 16:36 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. item.title: 游릭 2:24 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.

item.title: 游댮 14:19 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 游댮 14:19 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 14:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291
item.description: 游 14:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291#햌혞혪햫혜햨햦햧_햟햧쮏 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
